title: Solar lights going green in Thailand solar power in Thailand check it out!

tasks.task: Unboxing and setup of solar-powered devices
subtasks: Opening the package containing the solar panel and light fitting
Inspecting the components (solar panel, light fitting, remote control)
Assembling the light fitting (locating battery compartment, attaching screws)
Connecting the solar panel to the light fitting and fan
Positioning the solar panel in direct sunlight for charging

tasks.task: Installation and testing of the solar-powered fan
subtasks: Opening the fan packaging and unboxing
Assembling the solar-powered fan (connecting batteries, attaching screws)
Placing the fan in sunlight for charging
Monitoring the charge time and functionality of the fan

tasks.task: Evaluating the performance and durability of the solar-powered products
subtasks: Assessing the light fitting's illumination duration (8 hours)
Testing the fan's output and duration (2 hours on high, less than 8 hours on low)
Comparing expected performance with actual results
Considering potential modifications (using larger solar panels) for better performance
